channel.title: Admin glow
channel.description: does anyone know codes for admin glow? thanks post plz

item.title: Admin glow
item.dc:creator: @liltwixis11 liltwixis11
item.description:
@liltwixis11 wrote:

for admin glow, modglow, and owner glow here the code
in client.java hit ctr+f put this in and click find

public boolean isUntradable(int item)

and above it add this

public boolean adglow = false; public boolean pmodglow = false; public boolean ownerglow = false;
so it looks like this

[code]public boolean adglow = false;
public boolean pmodglow = false;
public boolean ownerglow = false;

public boolean isUntradable(int item) {
for(int i = 0; i < untradable.length; i++) {
if(untradable[i] == item)
return true;
}
return false;
}[/code]
then look for

is being called regularily every 500ms

and under it add this

if (adglow == true) {//Admin Glow stillgfx(246, absY, absX); } if (pmodglow == true) {//PMod Glow stillgfx(247, absY, absX); } if (ownerglow == true) {//Owner Glow stillgfx(332, absY, absX); }
so it looks like this

public boolean process() { // is being called regularily every 500ms if (adglow == true) {//Admin Glow stillgfx(246, absY, absX); } if (pmodglow == true) {//PMod Glow stillgfx(247, absY, absX); } if (ownerglow == true) {//Owner Glow stillgfx(332, absY, absX); }
now search for

/*END OF FRAME TESTING*/

add this below it

[code] else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pmodglow”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
pmodglow = true;
}

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("adminglow") && playerRights >= 2)
    {
           adglow = true;
    }

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("ownerglow") && playerRights >= 3)
    {
           ownerglow = true;
    }

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pmodglowoff") && playerRights >= 1)
    {
           pmodglow =false;
    }

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("adminglowoff") && playerRights >= 2)
    {
           adglow = false;
    }

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("ownerglowoff") && playerRights >= 3)
    {
           ownerglow = false;
    }[/code]

now to turn mod glow on type ::pmod
to turn admin glow on type ::adminglow
to turn ownerglow on type ::ownerglow
and add “off” to the end of each 1 to turn them off.

Read full topic
